summary: Landing page composition was simplified by removing the Our Work section from the rendered LandingPage, and the Service Areas + Coverage text were updated to the specified 14 locations. Services cards and CTAs appear text-only, but decorative iconography/images still exist in the codebase (footer Heart icon and the OurWorkSection gallery component).

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove all service images and decorative iconography so the website is simple and text-based (no in service-related sections; no service-card icons; no emoji/icon prefixes in Service Areas; CTAs text-only).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows remaining decorative iconography in the footer (lucide-react Heart icon). Also the OurWorkSection component is still present and described as a gallery with images, which conflicts with the "no " acceptance criterion for gallery/work examples (even if not rendered).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (OurWorkSection described as displaying work examples with images)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/kept 'Built with â€¦ using caffeine.ai' attribution including a Heart icon in the footer.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement and introduces decorative iconography, which also conflicts with the text-only simplification goal.
